edu.um.cps2004.task1.player

Class TTTPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.um.cps2004.task1.player.TTTPlayer

  • public final class TTTPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    The player of the TTT game. The player has got a robot responsible for playing in the correct position and a mark (either X or O) with which to play.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    JP

    • Constructor Detail

      • TTTPlayer

        public TTTPlayer(Mark mark,
                 TTTRobot robot)
        Sets the sign and the robot for this player. The robot master name may not be null.
        Parameters:
        mark - The sign with which this player is playing, may not be null
        robot - The robot which is playing for this payer, may not be null

      • getMark

        public Mark getMark()
        Gets the playing mark for the player
        Returns:
        The player's mark (either X or O), never null.

      • getMarkOfOpponent

        public Mark getMarkOfOpponent()
        Gets the playing mark of your opponent. Assumes a two-player game (breaks otherwise).
        Returns:
        The mark of the player's opponent (either X or O), never null.
